casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Dwayne LEWIS 140PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2018 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, For Lewis, Robert Dwayne Milind Kumar Dongre, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender

The following order has been entered on the Joint Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of December 2018 by:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of December 2018."

Defendant and State of NC shall have up to and including the 6th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
